headline: Chart (NYSE:GTLS) Misses Q3 Revenue Estimates
summary: Gas handling company Chart (NYSE:GTLS) missed Wall Street’s revenue expectations in Q3 CY2025 as sales rose 3.6% year on year to $1.10 billion. Its non-GAAP profit of $2.78 per share was 11.2% below analysts’ consensus estimates.

raw.headline: Chart (NYSE:GTLS) Misses Q3 Revenue Estimates

headline: Chart Industries Reports Third Quarter 2025 Financial Results
summary: HOUSTON, Oct. 29, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Chart Industries, Inc. (NYSE: GTLS) today reported results for the third quarter ended September 30, 2025. On July 28, 2025 Baker Hughes (NASDAQ: BKR) and Chart entered into a definitive agreement for Baker Hughes to acquire all outstanding shares of Chart’s common stock for $210 per share in cash. In the third quarter, we recorded an expense of $266 million for the merger termination fee to Flowserve (NYSE: FLS), $258 million of which was paid by Baker

On July 28, 2025 Baker Hughes (NASDAQ: BKR) and Chart entered into a definitive agreement for Baker Hughes to acquire all outstanding shares of Chart’s common stock for $210 per share in cash.
